title: See President Trump address the nation after US strikes on Venezuela
shortDescription: See President Donald Trump address the nation after the U.S. struck Venezuela and captured the South American country's leader, Nicolás Maduro.

title: Republicans rally behind Trump's Venezuela strikes: 'Face justice'
shortDescription: While congressional Republicans applauded Trump's actions as a new day in Latin America, Democrats questioned repercussions by foreign adversaries.

title: Trump to speak after capture of Venezuela's Maduro. How to watch.
shortDescription: Trump is expected to give more details about an overnight operation in Venezuela.

title: US conducted strike on Venezuela, captured Maduro, Trump says
shortDescription: President Donald Trump confirmed the U.S. was behind the strike several hours after explosions shook Venezuela's capital city of Caracas.

title: Watch live: Trump says US will 'run' Venezuela after capturing Maduro
shortDescription: Trump said Venezuelan leader Nicolás Maduro and his wife were "captured and flown out of the Country."

title: Trump stops motorcade to shop for White House ballroom marble
shortDescription: Two days into 2026, President Trump and his motorcade made a surprise pit stop to find just the right marble for his White House ballroom.

title: Trump takes more aspirin than recommended
shortDescription: President Donald Trump told the Wall Street Journal he has been taking more aspirin than recommended for years.

title: Latest on Minnesota fraud scandal: Trump admin freezes thousands of loans
shortDescription: The Trump administration has suspended nearly 7,000 borrowers in Minnesota from small business loans, citing suspected fraud.

title: Trump explains hand bruises: Takeaways from WSJ interview
shortDescription: In an interview defending his health, President Trump said his heavy intake of aspirin is the cause of noticeable bruises on his hand.

title: Trump threatens to intervene in Iran
shortDescription: President Donald Trump threatened to intervene in Iran where deadly civic unrest is rising over the cost of living.

title: See what Trump did for New Year's Eve
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and first lady Melania Trump hosted a New Year's Eve party with members and guests at Trump's Mar-a-Lago Club in Palm Beach.

title: How tall is Donald Trump's family? NYE pics show heads above the crowd
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has a tall family, from in-law Lara Trump to youngest son Barron Trump. His family is pictured among tallest at the NYE gala.

title: Trump says US will 'come to their rescue' if Iran kills protesters
shortDescription: President Trump vowed the United States will intervene if Iran kills peaceful protesters amid demonstrations in the country over the economy.
